Name: InfoTravel
Point One: Travel information service allowing travellers to view information on destinations with a single search
Point Two: Gathers information from external APIs such as currency exchange, weather, news and more
Point Three: Uses HTML, CSS, Bootstrap 5, Javascript, Google Fonts and External APIs

Name: React Portfolio
Point One: Designed, developed and deployed a portfolio using React to showcase portfolio projects
Point Two: Incorporates hooks and responsive design to deliver a smooth, reactive experience
Point Three: Uses HTML, CSS, Javascript, React, React Router, Node.js, Google Fonts
